search.cmd_desc: Search for an anime with keywords.

params.name: content_type
params.description: What type of content you want returned.
params.notes:
Valid Options: ova, ona, show, short, movie, special, music, manga, novel, oneshot
Defaults to *show*

params.name: search_string
params.description: What anime you want to search.

seasonal.cmd_desc: Displays the top 3 seasonal anime from the current season.

params.name: results
params.description: Number of anime to be displayed.

params.name: season
params.description: What season of anime you want.

params.name: year
params.description: The year of the anime season.

info.cmd_desc: Generate a card from a MAL id

params.name: content_type
params.description: The MAL id of the anime
params.notes: This only supports ids for anime as of right now.

admin-kill.cmd_desc: Completely shuts down the bot. Must react to the bot message with <:askukaL:1136812895859134555> within 10 seconds.
